# descriptorForRequiredKeys()

**Type Method**

Use to fetch all contact keys required to create vCard data from a contact.

## Declaration

```swift
class func descriptorForRequiredKeys() -> any CNKeyDescriptor
```

## Return Value

A key descriptor to be used in the [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactFetchRequest/keysToFetch] array when fetching the contacts.
